You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &tcaron;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Tcaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0164/index.htm U+00164].
  * `&tcaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0165/index.htm U+00165].
